name: Primordial Matriarch
movement: flies at an impressive speed of 120 feet
description: A gargantuan elemental that embodies raw power, with exceptional dexterity and resilience, featuring magical and damaging Elemental Attacks.
memorable: Her ability to change elemental damage types and create numerous elementals makes her a dynamic foe in battle.
goals: To dominate and control the battlefield through elemental chaos.
relations: Might summon various elemental creatures, such as mephits and elementals, to assist her.
environment: Typically found in areas saturated with elemental energy, such as elemental planes or locations of natural disasters.
strengths: Immunities to various conditions and damage types, high mobility, and powerful magical attacks.
weaknesses: Relatively low intelligence may affect her strategic planning.
attacks: Uses Storm Blast to unleash elemental energy and Elemental Lashes in melee with magical damage.
most_powerful_ability: Her Elemental Aura damages all nearby creatures and her ability to absorb elementals for temporary hit points.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 120 feet, allowing her to sense creatures without sight.
skills: Has good perception with a +5 modifier, indicating awareness of her surroundings.
additional_information: Can create and command multiple elementals at once
Damages nonmagical weapons that strike her
Her elemental nature allows her to function without basic needs
Can adapt to specific damage types on the fly
Recognized as a Siege Monster, dealing double damage to structures
test_queries: elemental immune to various damage types
powerful creature that embodies raw nature
elemental that deals damage in area around her
